titleStmt.title: Just at St. Andrews Wardrobe Church, between Doctors Commons and Puddle-dock at the Hat and Feathers at Mr. Mayhew. Liveth a physician which hath a pill far beyond any medicament ever yet known, or at least published, which cureth those diseases so many pretend to, and so few do understand, called, the French Pox, and Gonorrhoea ...

Just at St. Andrews Wardrobe Church, between Doctors Commons and Puddle-dock at the Hat and Feathers at Mr. Mayhew. Liveth a physician which hath a pill far beyond any medicament ever yet known, or at least published, which cureth those diseases so many pretend to, and so few do understand, called, the French Pox, and Gonorrhoea ...

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
